thread.title: Scorsese, De Niro close in on Del.-connected film

title: Scorsese, De Niro close in on Del.-connected film
text:
Published By: Delaware Online - Today 
After 7 years of waiting, Martin Scorsese might be ready for film based on Delaware author Charles Brandt's book. ...
